# Seed of Undeath, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]]

**Level:** [[7th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 7]], [[7th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 7]], [[7th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 7]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 14th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 14]], [[BoXM 14th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 14]]

**Casting Time:** 1 full round

**Components:** V, S, M (a black onyx worth at least 5,000 gp)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Area:** 40-ft.-radius emanation

**Duration:** 1 day/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Complete Mage (WotC), pg. 116

*Every creature in the area briefly takes on a corpselike appearance, then returns to normal.*

This spell functions like *[[Seed of Undeath (Spell)|seed of undeath]]**,* except it applies to any humanoid or animal that dies in the area while the spell is in effect.

Corpses of creatures that died before you cast the spell, or that died outside the area and were then carried within, are unaffected.
